tips: Behold! A thousand cereals! I collect cereals.

HEY. Stop playing vidio-games.
I've had enough of your _stupid_ vidio-games.
Aren't you both a little oO-o-Oold to be playing vidio-games?

tips.text: I am coming to your house

tips: As a Sniper, aim for the head in order to inflict critical damage.
If you rock and stone, you're never alone!
When Laby says "Do something, it'll be funny" never do it. It'll never be funny.
